tool.name: GEMMA Analysis
tool.description: Run association tests and kinship analysis with GEMMA
tool.help:
This tool runs various GEMMA analyses. Choose from: - LM: Linear Model for association testing. - LMM: Linear Mixed Model for association testing with relatedness (requires a kinship matrix). - GK: Kinship calculation (genetic relationship matrix).
Provide a PLINK binary dataset as input. For LMM, also provide a precomputed kinship matrix. For lm/lmm analysis, the tool applies the Wald test.
